posts.post_content: i got one of these at the gatecrash prerelease! :p i like how it dodges creature removal in the form of sorcery and enchantment. if your opponent wants to rid of him, they have to target it with instants. which means, obzedat is resistant to 50% of removal spells. he comes back to suck your opponent's life and can even attack too, with its 5/5 haste body.
